ngiemboon: À te túŋte penkʉ́ pé wɔ́.
en: He doesn't watch over his children.
They are eating the roasted plantain.
He danced until he was happy.

ngiemboon: Anò gie ɔ̀ gɔɔn lɛ̀, aa ntʉ̀ nò.
en: What you are saying here is serious.

ngiemboon: Ammó ntʉ̀ tʉ̀ gie áa lefaŋ ge laʼ gwete ntsèm.
en: From the sky everything that is solid will fall.

ngiemboon: Néŋe tsetsáʼ na lelÿɔʼ mbà, é ge tʉa.
en: Put the earth on the yam otherwise it will harden.
